### ðŸŽ® Single Emulator Port List

| Emulator                  | Port(s)          |
|:--------------------------|:-----------------|
| **MuMu**                  | `7555`           |
| **BlueStacks / LDPlayer** | `5555`           |

> âš ï¸ **If you use BlueStacks**, make sure the \
> **ADB port debug function** is enabled in settings.
---

ðŸ’¡ *Tip:* These ports are used for ADB connections between your PC and the emulator.  
If you encounter connection issues, verify that the emulatorâ€™s **ADB debugging option** is turned on and that no other emulator instance is occupying the same port.
